description: An abstraction for a query condition.

rightHandSide.description: While this is a list, most condition require a single value, with the exception of the 'IN' which takes a list.

concreteType.description: Indicates the concrete type of this condition.  It must be: org.sagebionetworks.repo.model.entity.query.AnnotationCondition, or org.sagebionetworks.repo.model.entity.query.EntityCondition.
